text: A20.2J cells were incubated for six hours with membrane-permeable SMAC-N7 peptide or 1.5 % DMSO ( solvent used for the peptide ) .
Following the incubation , cell lysates were prepared , fractionated by SDS-PAGE , and evaluated by Western blot ( lanes 1 and 2 ) .
Cells incubated with DMSO or SMAC-N7 were also stimulated with magnetic beads coated with anti-CD40 or an isotype control antibody .
Immunoprecipitated ( IP ) material bound to the beads was loaded in lanes 3-5 .
Samples of the cell lysates after immunoprecipitation appear in lanes 6-8 .

Western blots were probed with antibodies specific for <extra_id_0> cIAP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> TRAF2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> TRAF3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and <extra_id_0> HOIP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( approximate molecular weights indicated on left ) .
Similar results were obtained in two additional experiments .

( B ) <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> was isolated by immunoprecipitation ( as in ( A ) ) from A20.2J cells and <extra_id_0> HOIP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - deficient cells transduced with an empty retroviral vector ( pMIP ) or a retroviral vector encoding <extra_id_0> HOIP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .

Material immunoprecipitated with an isotype control antibody ( isotype ) or anti-CD40 antibody was examined by Western blotting for <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> TRAF2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> TRAF3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> cIAP1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> HOIP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , <extra_id_0> IKKalpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> / <extra_id_0> beta <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and <extra_id_0> IKKgamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( right panels ) .
<extra_id_0> HOIP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> expression was required for coprecipitation of IKK proteins with <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
Cell lysates from unstimulated cells are shown in the left panels .
Similar results were obtained in a second experiment and in two experiments with a second <extra_id_0> HOIP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - deficient clone .

( C ) To further evaluate <extra_id_0> HOIP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - dependent recruitment of <extra_id_0> IKKgamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> to <extra_id_0> CD40 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , A20.2J cells or <extra_id_0> HOIP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - deficient ( <extra_id_0> HOIP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> - / - ) A20.2J cells were transduced with an empty retroviral vector or a retroviral construct encoding BP epitope-tagged <extra_id_0> IKKgamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( noted in the figure as <extra_id_0> pMIP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> IKKgamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , respectively ) .

text: Lysates ( lanes 1-3 ) and immunoprecipitation ( IP ) samples ( lanes 4-11 ) from the cell lines were fractionated by SDS-PAGE and evaluated by Western blotting with antibodies to the BP tag ( <extra_id_0> IKKgamma <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , upper panel ) and <extra_id_0> TRAF2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
The anti-CD40 IP sample in lane 11 was treated with lambda phosphatase ; the sample in lane 10 was mock-treated .

Protein samples ( minus those treated with phosphatase ) were also fractionated on a separate gel ( lower acrylamide concentration ) for the evaluation of <extra_id_0> TRAF3 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> and <extra_id_0> HOIP <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( bottom two panels ) .
Similar results were obtained in two additional experiments .
